Method.name: ConvertToProxyObject
Method.Implementation: set proxy = ##class(%ZEN.proxyObject).%New() set proxy.id = ..%Id() set proxy.lastName = ..LastName.Value set proxy.firstName = ..FirstName.Value set proxy.middleName = ..MiddleName.Value if (shortInfo = 1) quit proxy set proxy.email = ..Email set proxy.phone = ..Phone quit proxy

Method.name: GetEmployeeByParameter
Method.Implementation:
set id = ""
&sql(SELECT EmployeeTab.ID INTO :id FROM Sti_Data.Employee as EmployeeTab INNER JOIN Sti_Data_Localization.LTextValue as ltvalLN ON ltvalLN.LText = EmployeeTab.LastName INNER JOIN Sti_Data_Localization.LTextValue as ltvalFN ON ltvalFN.LText = EmployeeTab.FirstName WHERE %UPPER(ltvalLN.Value) = %UPPER(TRIM(BOTH ' ' FROM :lName)) AND %UPPER(ltvalFN.Value) = %UPPER(TRIM(BOTH ' ' FROM :fName)) AND EmployeeTab.Email = :email)
quit ..%OpenId(id)

Method.name: Save
GetEmployeeByEmail
Method.Implementation:
set id = ""
&sql(SELECT UniversityTab.ID INTO :id FROM Sti_Data.Employee as UniversityTab WHERE UniversityTab.Email = :fName ) quit ..%OpenId(id)
